text: "A Tear Fell" is a 1956 song by Teresa Brewer and went to number 2 in the United Kingdom and number 5 in the United States. Its B-side to her single Bo Weevil and was covered by Billy "Crash" Craddock and Ivory Joe Hunter. ==References== Category:1956 songs Category:Country songs Category:Teresa Brewer songs Category:Billy "Crash" Craddock songs Category:Solomon Burke songs
title: A Tear Fell
